about_the_game:
Immerse Yourself in the Ultimate Digital TTRPG Experience!

The RPG Engine is your all-in-one toolkit for creating and experiencing dynamic roleplaying worlds. Whether you're a seasoned Game Master or a newcomer, our powerful engine transforms your tabletop adventures into interactive 3D experiences.

As a Game Master, tap into your creativity with an intuitive world-building interface. Design and manage immersive 3D maps, complete with:

  • Build new custom maps and form them into campaigns. 

  • Terrain Sculpting: Mold the landscape, including overhangs and caves, and paint the terrain.

  • Interactive Props: Populate your world with items for players to discover.

  • Character Creation: Develop custom characters with various skin tones, hair, features, and clothing. 

  • Dynamic Control: Equip and unequip weapons and items, and import images as flat maps, signs, or standee characters.

  • Add premade or construct kitbashed weapons, items, and gear to your world. 

  • Custom Servers: If you know someone with the Builders or GameMasters DLC; host a server that they can join.

Dive into unique, hand-crafted 3D worlds with your friends. Experience rich gameplay features, including:

  • Exploration: Navigate through custom-built environments.

  • Character Control: Animate and control your characters seamlessly.

  • Assign standardized and custom characters to your players, enhancing their agency as you see fit.

  • Combat Visualization: Engage in thrilling combat scenarios.

  • Real-Time Communication: Chat with fellow players to enhance storytelling.

  • Special Effects: Enhance your narrative with stunning visual effects.

Need fast access to an item or a fully built world? Simply download from the Steam Workshop and have it in seconds.

Assets created in game can be shared with others- this includes maps, characters, special items, and player sheets.

We believe in sharing and growing our creations as a community, as such, workshop sharing will always remain free.

Beyond TTRPGs

The RPG Engine's versatile interface is perfect for various creative applications, such as:

  • Brainstorming Sessions

  • Storyboarding Projects

  • Visual Storytelling

  • Level Design Prototyping

Join us in revolutionizing tabletop roleplaying. With The RPG Engine, your imagination is the only limit!

Ready to Craft Your Adventure?

Download The RPG Engine today and start building your own interactive worlds!

This is the base version of the game, if you wish to unlock all features, consider the Builders Edition DLC. Want to host all of your friends?... Check out the GameMasters Edition.

Need More?

The base version provides an introduction to The RPG Engine and is more than sufficient for people joining other games or those who want to try out the game. Builders Edition DLC gives you more tools, workshop sharing, many more assets, and the ability to bring one Base player into the party pool. GameMasters Edition makes you the ultimate GM with endless seats for Base players (they join free!).

Immerse Yourself in the Ultimate Digital TTRPG Experience!

The RPG Engine is your all-in-one toolkit for creating and experiencing dynamic roleplaying worlds. Whether you're a seasoned Game Master or a newcomer, our powerful engine transforms your tabletop adventures into interactive 3D experiences.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.1 GPU
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.1 GPU
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: The RPG Engine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.1 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft .NET Framework 4 Client Profile
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft .NET Framework 4 Client Profile

short_description: Host immersive tabletop campaigns in a world imagined entirely by you! Build from the ground up with The RPG Engine, an intuitive virtual tabletop that lets you create unparalleled roleplaying environments for your party to get lost in.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Arabic, Dutch, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian, Albanian, Hindi, Welsh, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
